com.epam.hubarevich.dao

Interface NewsDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractDAO<News>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NewsDAOImpl

    public interface NewsDAO
extends AbstractDAO<News>
    Interface for News message database operations
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Anton_Hubarevich
